com.jgefroh.core

Class AbstractInfoPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgefroh.core.AbstractInfoPack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfoPack

    public abstract class AbstractInfoPack
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInfoPack
    An IInfoPack that acts as an adapter.

    Extend this to create new InfoPack types.

    Author:
    Joseph Gefroh
